title: Palmist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to spend two nights reading the palms of three players. At the end of the second night, if among those three players, at least one was attacked and at least one attacked someone else, give all three powerful defense tonight. For the rest of the game, any evil players within the group cannot visit the other two members of the group.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You visit your target both nights when using your ability.
- You may target yourself.
- Palm-reading does not stop if a player within the group dies.
- *__Made for the Curated role list - Rebalanced from Rasen's One Who Geomances (3437)__*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang those who oppose the town.

desc:
Post 5176
*"Your palms have deep lines. That must mean..."*
